entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
